official_title: Nutrition and Exercise to Optimize Muscle and Adiposity in Adults With ALL: NEOMA ALL Trial
inclusion_criteria:
* New Diagnosis of Philadelphia Chromosome Negative B-ALL
* Receiving intensive pediatric-inspired induction chemotherapy
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 50 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* BMI â‰¤18.5 kg/m2 at time of diagnosis
* Unable to comply with both the recommended diet and exercise regimen as deemed by the research or treatment team
* Pregnant
